concept.title: Installing Additional Stage Libraries
concept.shortdesc: The includes a wide range of stages for pipeline development, but you might find a need for additional functionality. You can install additional stage libraries to provide access to additional stages.

conbody.p:
stage librariesinstalling additionalinstallationadditional stage librarieslibrariesinstalling stage librariesAt this time, you can install the following stage libraries:
Stage Library Available Client Library Versions Description
Apache Kafka 0.8.1.1
0.8.2.0
0.8.2.1 Use to access Kafka.
Provides a Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
CDH 5.2.1, 5.2.3, 5.2.4
5.3.0, 5.3.1, 5.3.2
5.4.0, 5.4.1 Use to write to the Cloudera CDH distribution of Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Solr
CDH Cluster Kafka 1.2.0 5.4.0
5.4.1 Use to read from the Cloudera distribution of the Apache Kafka 1.2.0.
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin.
cluster mode only.
CDH Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0) Use access the Cloudera distribution of Apache Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0).
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin and Kafka Producer destination.
Cassandra 2.1.5 Use to write to Apache Cassandra 1.2, 2.0, and 2.1.
Provides a Cassandra destination.
Elasticsearch 1.4.4
1.5.0 Use to write to Elasticsearch.
Provides an Elasticsearch destination.
HDP 2.2.0 Use to write to the Hortonworks distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Jython 2.7.0 Use to process scripts written in Jython.
Provides a Jython Evaluator processor.
Kinesis 1.2.1 Use to access Amazon Kinesis.
Provides a Kinesis origin and destination.
